Zygote xenopus.Definition: The point of fertilization, 0 to 1 hour. Alternate Definition: Nieuwkoop and Faber stage 1; age 0 hr; corresponding to the following external morphological criteria: One cell stage, shortly after fertilization. Pigmentation darker ventrally than dorsally. Length: 1.4 - 1.5 mm. (Xenopus anatomy and development: http://purl.org/obo/owl/XAO#XAO_1000001)
